body:
[More accurate cquery](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1x-RqFFEcGIzVgtYHIq6s6Qt4vYtJWz3nuHIuqeI89dU/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.5mcn15i0e1ch) would pave the way to reliable `rdeps`. It's partially implemented, waiting for someone to commit energy to finish.

Without that change I only expect `deps` and `somepath` to be fully reliable. 

I'd scope this bug to at least providing an informative error instead of a crash. That might be a bit challenging though.
